pkgmetadata.longdescription: Graphical Visualizations for Multi-Objective Optimization // Visualization of multi-dimensional data arising in multi- objective optimization, including plots of the empirical attainment function (EAF), M. Lpez-Ibez, L. Paquete, and T. Sttzle (2010) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-02538-9_9, and symmetric Vorob'ev expectation and deviation, M. Binois, D. Ginsbourger, O. Roustant (2015) doi:10.1016/j.ejor.2014.07.032, among others.
